average over 4 rounds
1 training example
18+24+24+18=84
84/112 = 0.75

2 tr
22+24+24+22=92
92/112 = 0.821

3 tr
27+24+24+22=97
97/112 = 0.866

4 tr
28+28+24+22=102
102/112 = 0.911

5 tr
28+28+28+27=111
111/112 = 0.991

6 tr
28+28+28+27=111
111/112 = 0.991


7 tr
28+28+28+28=112
112/112 = 1

8 tr
112/112 = 1
